Package org.netgene.network.training.data

Class TrainingData

java.lang.Object
org.netgene.network.training.data.TrainingData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TrainingData extends Object implements Serializable
This class holds the input data set and a target data set used to train a neural network
